author: Jessica Bennett
title: 16 Celebrities That Married Their Fans (PHOTOS)
text:
Julia met Danny on the set of The Mexican where he worked as a cameraman. Patrick Dempsey & Jillian Fink Patrick Dempsey & Jillian Fink Advertisement 
Patrick met his wife when he booked an appointment at a salon and she just so happened to be his hairstylist. Reportedly, she still cuts his hair to this day. Katie Holmes & Tom Cruise Katie Holmes & Tom Cruise Advertisement 
The currently single actress admitted to having a huge crush on ex-husband Tom Cruise as a teenager. Kelsey Grammer & Kayte Walsh Kelsey Grammer & Kayte Walsh Advertisement 
Kayte admitted to being a die-hard Frasier fan before she even met the actor on a plane while working as a flight attendant. Steve & Marjorie Harvey Steve & Marjorie Harvey Advertisement 
Steve and Marjorie met at a comedy club where Steve was performing stand-up and took notice of the beauty in the audience. Anne Hathaway & Adam Shulman Anne Hathaway & Adam Shulman Advertisement 
Adam has stated on several occasions that he was a fan of Anne’s work long before they met. Adam & Jackie Sandler Adam & Jackie Sandler Advertisement 
The couple met through mutual friends after Jackie told them his films were hilarious. She’s appeared in a number of his Happy Madison productions since they tied the knot in 2003. Nicolas Cage & Alice Kim
